title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. I, ch. VI, subch. A, pt. 462 - Access To Personal Information
content:

State Regulations
§ 462.1 - Procedures for providing access to records
§ 462.2 - Amendment to records
§ 462.3 - Appeal procedure
§ 462.4 - Statement of disagreement by data subject
§ 462.5 - Records which are exempt from disclosure

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. I, ch. VI, subch. A, pt. 462

Statutory authority: PRHPL §3.09[8]; Public Officers Law, § 94[2]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
